title: Is Mrs. Tusswood at Berlin Place Trump Wax Brick in the dump?
subtitle: The Trump statue was displayed along with the markings containing famous words about reality television the star of the transformation of politics.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Before the 2020 general election, Ms. Tusswoods presented the Berlin wax museum semi-President Donald Trump in the trash as part of an exhibition with a sign, "Damp Trump."
